title: Enhancing Software Development Practical Competencies: Mobile-Based Language Learning Design for Adult Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners will utilize professional terminology required in workplace contexts with 80% accuracy.
Learners will share language learning materials with peers via social network-based collaboration tools.
Learners will enhance language expression skills by creating and sharing audio content via smartphones.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
